archimate:Requirement.name: SM.2.7.5f: f) includes an application of retention (e.g. the amount an organisation must pay before a claim is paid out or the period of time before compensation for business interruption can be claimed)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
